subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Megan Wolfe’s first-period goal and Amanda Leveille’s 19 saves helped host Minnesota defeat Harvard, 4-1, for its third N.C.A.A. championship in four seasons.
snippet: Megan Wolfe’s first-period goal and Amanda Leveille’s 19 saves helped host Minnesota defeat Harvard, 4-1, for its third N.C.A.A. championship in four seasons.
